name: 02_Maze_Solver_Q_Learning_Gridworld_RL
query: Build a Gridworld maze solver using Q-learning. Implement the environment in `src/env.py` with configurable grid size and start/end positions, implement Q-learning in `src/train.py`, record episodes and returns, save `results/figures/learning_curve.png`, save `results/figures/path_changes.gif`, and save the model as `models/saved_models/q_learning_model.npy`.

requirements.criteria: The "Gridworld" environment is defined in `src/env.py` with the ability for a user to specify a grid size and start/end positions.
Learning curves are recorded during training, and saved as `results/figures/learning_curve.png`. Episodes and returns are recorded.
The learned model is saved as `models/saved_models/q_learning_model.npy`.
Paths taken during learning are visualized and saved as `results/figures/path_changes.gif`.

preferences.criteria: Some real-time progress or feedback during the training process should be displayed.
The code should be easy to modify or extend later.
